page.title: 10Malmesbury Carnival
page.content: The{Carnival}began in the 1920' to help finance Malmesbury Hospital.These days it is a fundraiser for a large number of local{charities}and{clubs}as well as a source of entertainment and encouragement for personal and group effort, as the 1984 programme shows: Aug 24 Crowning of{Carnival Queen Aug 25 W.I.market,Butterfly Queen Aug 26{Petticoat Lane}market and auction.Concert.Swimming Gala.Bowls. Aug 27{Medieval Fayre and Fete.} { } Flower Show.Mini{Marathon. Six Aside{Cricket. Aug 29{Bingo. Aug 29_31 Carnival{Show Time. Sept 1 Carnival{Procession }from 6pm {Bands.}Prizes.Trophies for Tableaux and Fancy Dress.Jazz Sept 2{Road Safety Competition Carnival{Thanksgiving}Service
